name: Humble Pie
description: Humble Pie puts you in a late night confrontation with a demanding snack-obsessed POTUS armed with nothing but your courage and a stack of freshly baked cherry pies. You're given 3 rounds of 30 seconds and all the pies you can throw. Forget the headlines and laugh your stress away in this light-hearted piece of 'virtual therapy'.
developers: Ethan Stickley, Kevin K. Shah, Kevin Leekley
